name: Harry Stephen
description: I don’t like writing about myself. I am a 54 years old open minded man from Blackburn with Darwen. I have brown eyes and dark brown hair, my body is about average, and I live alone. I have children, and they live away from home I’m single, white / caucasian, but I like the funny woman. I’m looking for you, if you are a hetero, single and clever girl, who likes about average man. Come with me!
